process.description: TCP4-2105 Verify a self service task with interstitial using the Lock assignment option returning with an exclusive gateway
process.name: TCP4-2105 Verify a self service task with interstitial using the Lock assignment option returning with an exclusive gateway
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="StartEvent" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_5</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_2" name="selfservice" pm:screenRef="847" pm:allowInterstitial="true" pm:interstitialScreenRef="846" pm:assignment="self_service" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_5</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_19</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="Form Task" pm:screenRef="845" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_13</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_5" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_2"/>
    <bpmn:exclusiveGateway id="node_6" name="Exclusive Gateway">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_13</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:exclusiveGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_6"/>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_9" name="Send Email" pm:config="{"type":"text","subject":"Guau {{_request.id}}","textBody":"Guau {{_request.id}}","screenRef":null,"users":[],"groups":[],"addEmails":["pablo.barroso@processmaker.com"],"emailServer":"","requestRecipients":[],"usersAndGroupsOptionSelected":false}" implementation="connector-send-email/processmaker-communication-email-send">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_19</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="var1 == 1" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_9">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">var1 == 1</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_13" name="var1 == 2" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_3">
      <bpmn:conditionExpression xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">var1 == 2</bpmn:conditionExpression>
    </bpmn:sequenceFlow>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_12" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_12"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_19" name="" sourceRef="node_9" targetRef="node_2"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="70" y="270" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="190" y="230" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="520" y="450" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <di:waypoint x="88" y="288"/>
        <di:waypoint x="248" y="268"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="410" y="240" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <di:waypoint x="248" y="268"/>
        <di:waypoint x="428" y="258"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <dc:Bounds x="550" y="60" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="428" y="258"/>
        <di:waypoint x="608" y="98"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <di:waypoint x="428" y="258"/>
        <di:waypoint x="578" y="488"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <dc:Bounds x="720" y="500" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="578" y="488"/>
        <di:waypoint x="738" y="518"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_19_di" bpmnElement="node_19">
        <di:waypoint x="608" y="98"/>
        <di:waypoint x="248" y="268"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
